title: Enzyme
description: Schema for submitting an enzyme used for digestion of DNA as part of the chromatin capture assay.

name.title: Enzyme Name
name.description: The name of the digestion enzyme.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the enzyme.

enzyme_source.title: Enzyme Source
enzyme_source.description: The Lab or Vendor that provided the enzyme.

catalog_number.title: Product Catalog Number
catalog_number.description: A plain text for catalog description.

recognition_sequence.title: Cut Sequence
recognition_sequence.description: The bases of the enzyme recognition sequence.

site_length.title: Site Length
site_length.description: The length of the enzyme recognition sequence.
site_length.comment: this can be calculated if a recognition sequence is provided but can be set even without recognition sequence

cut_position.title: Cut position
cut_position.description: The position in the provided recognition sequence at which the enzyme cuts AFTER - relative to base 1 of site.
cut_position.comment: has a dependency on either cut_sequence or site_length

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.
